answers.author: Adam Carpenetti
answers.text:
Other than those needing facebook or other social media for their jobs, our employees have personal or quota time to surf these types of sites.  It is limited to 1 hr/day.  We do not have a town-wide policy for social media but one was recently created at our PD as there were several issues that really pushed for it.

author: Todd Richardson
text:
I am looking for any policies that 9-1-1 Centers have in regards to internet and social media sites.  Are employees allowed access?  Is that access limited or unrestricted?  Are certain sites restricted (excluding the obvious no-no sites)?  
If you do allow your employees to surf the internet and access social media while working, do you find it to be to big a distraction and that it impedes that actual work that is supposed to be going on?
title: Internet and Social Media
